statements: SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT advertiser_name, website FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id > 100;
SELECT contact_email FROM advertisers WHERE website LIKE '%.com';
SELECT * FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_name = 'Example Advertiser' ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT advertiser_id, contact_email FROM advertisers WHERE website LIKE '%example.com%'
SELECT DISTINCT advertiser_name FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM advertisers ORDER BY website ASC, advertiser_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT advertiser_id, website FROM advertisers WHERE contact_email = 'info@example.com'
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Tech';
SELECT * FROM user_browsing_history ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(url) AS num_visits FROM user_browsing_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_visits > 10;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, COUNT(id) AS total_advertisers FROM advertisers GROUP BY name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM advertisers JOIN user_browsing_history ON advertisers.id = user_browsing_history.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY industry ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT advertiser_name FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_name = 'Tech Co.';
SELECT ad_content FROM personalized_ads WHERE target_user_id = 2;
SELECT user_name, browsing_history FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 10;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, LENGTH(browsing_history) AS history_length FROM users WHERE LENGTH(browsing_history) > 100;
SELECT ad_content FROM personalized_ads WHERE target_user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE user_name = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, browsing_history FROM Users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Segmentation ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_content, advertiser_id, segment_id FROM Advertisements WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_name = 'Company X';
SELECT Users.user_name, Advertisements.ad_content FROM Users JOIN Advertisements ON Users.user_id = Advertisements.advertiser_id;
SELECT segment_name FROM Segmentation WHERE segment_id IN (SELECT segment_id FROM Advertisements WHERE ad_id = 1);

SELECT Users.user_name, Advertisements.ad_content, segment_name FROM Users JOIN Advertisements ON Users.user_id = Advertisements.advertiser_id JOIN Segmentation ON Advertisements.segment_id = Segmentation.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, advertiser_id FROM advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_name, user_age FROM users WHERE user_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM browsing_history ORDER BY visit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, COUNT(*) FROM user_segments GROUP BY segment_name;
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_gender FROM users WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM browsing_history WHERE visit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
